item.description:
Come join us for Tea & Gourmet Cookie Party at Some Enchanted Evening in Spencer, Ma.
in their cozy upstairs room from 2:30- 4:30 pm.

Everyone will receive two palm readings by two different people for $15.00.

Also, make sure you bring some extra money to spend it the store!
Diane the store owner has excellent taste, and there is a variety of pagan/ fantasy
nic knacks, ritual tools, books, incense, herbs, stones and jewelery and more, and I am
usually hard pressed to leave there without buying something!

Check out their website at:
http://www.someenchan...

For those who are interested, we will be going out to dinner after the tea party,
to Barber's Crossing in Leicester, Mass-

Check out their menu here:

http://www.barberscro...

Snow date will be the following Saturday, Feb 28th, so check email list for updates! :)
item.how_to_find_us: Come in the side door, into the store :)
item.name: Palm Reading/ Afternoon Tea Party
